title: Image Optimizer and Resizer

hero.first: Application to easily reduce the size and even dimensions of images in JPG, PNG and WEBP formats. Makes use of the

featurelist.title: Simple and straightforward interface
featurelist.text: Just drag one or more image files over the program window to start the process.

featurelist.title: Available in multiple languages
featurelist.text: Currently the interface is available in Portuguese, English and Spanish.

featurelist.title: Control over the output file
featurelist.text: You can choose to overwrite the file, create a folder for the result, create a new file or even make a backup of the original.

featurelist.title: Image resizing
featurelist.text: Scale down proportionately, scale down to fit or cover given dimensions, or create thumbnails.

featurelist.title: Image metadata management
featurelist.text: Here you can choose to remove or preserve the copyright, geolocation and date of the images.

featurelist.title: Control over usage
featurelist.text: You know at all times how many compressions you did in the current month and how many images just have been processed.

featuresobs.first: To use this application it is necessary to create an account on the
featuresobs.last: website. This account is completely free for up to 500 image compressions per month.
